AI Description: VCFtools is a software package for manipulating and analyzing genetic variation data stored in Variant Call Format (VCF) files. It provides a wide range of tools for quality control, filtering, summarization, and other analyses of genetic variants.
Core Features: Manipulation Of Variant Call Format (Vcf) Files, Quality Control & Filtering Of Genetic Variation Data, Population Genetics Analyses, Linkage Disequilibrium Analysis, Variant Annotation & Statistics
General Tags: Genetic Variation Analysis, Variant Call Format (Vcf), Population Genetics, Bioinformatics
